summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation; authorizing the Superintendent of Parks and Recreation to acquire, for open space, park, and recreation purposes, Lots 25, 26, 27 and 28; EXCEPT the ease 70 feet of the north 14 feet of Lot 28, Block 1, Highland View Addition to the City of Seattle, according to the plat thereof recorded in Volume 18 of Plats, page 22, in King County, Washington, and to accept and record the deed.
